span.span: The type of elements in the collection.

summary.span: 提供泛型只读集合的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a generic read-only collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类的实例 始终是只读的。An instance of the generic class is always read-only. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 有关此类的可修改版本，请参阅。See for a modifiable version of this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了类的多个成员 。The following code example demonstrates several members of the class. 此代码示例将创建一个 字符串，并向其添加四个恐龙名称。The code example creates a of strings and adds four dinosaur names to it. 然后，该代码示例在中包装列表 。The code example then wraps the list in a . 演示了 、 、 和成员后 ，代码示例显示， 只是原始的包装，只需 将一个新项添加到 并显示的内容即可 。After demonstrating the , , , and members, the code example shows that the is just a wrapper for the original by adding a new item to the and displaying the contents of the . 最后，此代码示例创建一个大于集合的数组，并使用 方法将集合的元素插入到数组的中间。Finally, the code example creates an array larger than the collection and uses the method to insert the elements of the collection into the middle of the array. [!code-cpp[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/vb/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型) 成员 Visual Basic 的公共静态 (是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 只要不修改集合，就可以同时支持多个读取器。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 尽管如此，枚举集合本身并不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

para.span: 提供此基类是为了使实现者可以更轻松地创建泛型的只读自定义集合。

span.span: This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a generic read-only custom collection.

para.span: 鼓励实现者扩展此基类，而不是自行创建。

span.span: Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该实例是指定列表周围的只读包装。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is a read-only wrapper around the specified list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止任何修改 `list` ， `list` 只需要通过此包装器公开。To prevent any modifications to `list`, expose `list` only through this wrapper. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了此构造函数和类的多个成员 。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several members of the class. 此代码示例将创建一个 字符串，并向其添加四个恐龙名称。The code example creates a of strings and adds four dinosaur names to it. 然后，该代码示例通过将列表 传递给构造函数来包装中的列表。The code example then wraps the list in a by passing it to the constructor. 演示了 、 、 和成员后 ，代码示例显示， 只是原始的包装，只需 将一个新项添加到 并显示的内容即可 。After demonstrating the , , , and members, the code example shows that the is just a wrapper for the original by adding a new item to the and displaying the contents of the . 最后，此代码示例创建一个大于集合的数组，并使用 方法将集合的元素插入到数组的中间。Finally, the code example creates an array larger than the collection and uses the method to insert the elements of the collection into the middle of the array. summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach`C # 语言中 (的语句 `for each` 在 Visual C++ 中 `For Each` Visual Basic) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 中集合的默认实现 不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用枚举器显示包装的的内容 。The following code example uses the enumerator to display the contents of a that wraps a . 在 `foreach` `For Each` `for each` c + +) 的 Visual Basic 中 (的语句将隐藏枚举器。The enumerator is concealed by the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++). [!code-cpp[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向前搜索从第一个元素开始，到最后一个元素结束。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 此方法使用默认比较器确定相等性 。This method determines equality using the default comparer . 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了使用以下 c # 语法访问集合中的特定元素的功能： `myCollection[index]` (`myCollection(index)` Visual Basic) 。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[index]` (`myCollection(index)` in Visual Basic). C # 语言使用 [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了类的多个成员 。The following code example demonstrates several members of the class. 此代码示例将创建一个 字符串，并向其添加四个恐龙名称。The code example creates a of strings and adds four dinosaur names to it. 然后，该代码示例在中包装列表 。The code example then wraps the list in a . 演示了 、 、 和成员后 ，代码示例显示， 只是原始的包装，只需 将一个新项添加到 并显示的内容即可 。After demonstrating the , , , and members, the code example shows that the is just a wrapper for the original by adding a new item to the and displaying the contents of the . 最后，此代码示例创建一个大于集合的数组，并使用 方法将集合的元素插入到数组的中间。Finally, the code example creates an array larger than the collection and uses the method to insert the elements of the collection into the middle of the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了类的多个成员 。The following code example demonstrates several members of the class. 此代码示例将创建一个 字符串，并向其添加四个恐龙名称。The code example creates a of strings and adds four dinosaur names to it. 然后，该代码示例在中包装列表 。The code example then wraps the list in a . 演示了 、 、 和成员后 ，代码示例显示， 只是原始的包装，只需 将一个新项添加到 并显示的内容即可 。After demonstrating the , , , and members, the code example shows that the is just a wrapper for the original by adding a new item to the and displaying the contents of the . 最后，此代码示例创建一个大于集合的数组，并使用 方法将集合的元素插入到数组的中间。Finally, the code example creates an array larger than the collection and uses the method to insert the elements of the collection into the middle of the array. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中集合的默认实现 不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对的访问 。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns the current instance.

summary.span: 返回循环访问集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: 可用于循环访问集合的 。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach`C # 语言中 (的语句 `for each` 在 Visual C++ 中 `For Each` Visual Basic) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 中集合的默认实现 不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止添加和移除元素的包装;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，包括添加或删除元素，则固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此属性，可以使用以下语法来访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C # 语言使用 [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
